name: RewardStars
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reward stars
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Kids not doing their chores? Finding it hard to motivate them? Check out Reward Stars for Alexa!

You can now reward your family members with stars when they do something good! Keep track of how many stars each person earns for brushing their teeth, doing the dishes, hoovering the house! You name it!. Just say "Alexa open Reward Stars" on a device with a screen and setup multiple users with multiple different charts.

Choose between a weekly chart or a task based chart. Decide on how many stars they need to reach a reward.

Your children will love watching their progress as they complete various jobs and get closer. to a reward!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
